home.title: A lightweight, student-first learning platform
home.intro: Easily connect with teachers and students, and enjoy a complete and seamless remote learning experience — anytime, anywhere
home.about: EduLite is a lightweight digital education platform designed for areas with weak internet and real-life challenges for students and teachers.

features.chat: Real-time messaging between students and teachers
features.assignments: Assignment and exam creation and submission
features.lightweight: Extremely lightweight – works even with poor connectivity

home.openSourceText: EduLite is an open-source project. We welcome contributors from all over the world to join us on our mission.

about.title: About EduLite
about.subtitle: A student-first learning platform, built for areas with weak internet and real challenges.
about.storySubtitle: From real challenges came real solutions
about.storyCardSubtitle: From frustration to inspiration, from crisis to solution

pandemic.title: The Personal Struggle
pandemic.description: Picture this: A young student struggling with Microsoft Teams during the pandemic. Slow loading, confusing interface, constant crashes. That frustration sparked a thought: 'Why is education technology so... broken?'

gaza.title: The Breaking Point
gaza.description: Then came 2023. War erupted in Gaza. Over a million students cut off from education for more than a year. Watching this unfold, one question burned brighter than ever:

about.visionQuote: Why aren't we building something made for students?

solution.title: The EduLite Solution
solution.description: That's when everything clicked. EduLite wasn't just born from an idea — it was forged from real pain, real struggles, and a burning desire to build something that actually works for students who need it most.

globalImpact.title: Global Community
globalImpact.description: Built by passionate volunteers from Palestine, Canada, Sudan, Nigeria and developers worldwide who believe education should be accessible to everyone.

about.mission1Description: Every feature is designed with students in mind, ensuring ease of use and accessibility for learners of all ages and technical backgrounds.
about.mission2Description: Built to work seamlessly even in areas with weak internet connectivity and limited resources, ensuring no student is left behind.
about.feature1Description: Extremely lightweight design that works even with poor connectivity, ensuring no student is left behind due to technical limitations.
about.feature2Description: Seamless messaging between students and teachers to maintain constant educational support and build stronger learning communities.
about.feature3Description: Assignment creation, exam submission, lecture scheduling, and calendar integration all in one place for a unified learning experience.
about.feature4Description: Advanced anti-cheating system to maintain academic integrity while keeping the focus on learning and growth.
about.communityDescription: EduLite is a 100% volunteer-driven open source project. There is no funding or salaries involved. Everyone contributes out of passion for learning and helping others.
about.communityOrigin: Made with ❤️ from Palestine, Canada, Sudan, Nigeria and the global open-source community.
about.joinDescription: We welcome everyone — beginner or expert! Help us build something that matters for students worldwide.
about.finalQuote: EduLite is for every student who just wants to learn — no matter where they are.
